ai-tha-ap289:1.2_0: he sent a message to what.
ai-tha-ap289:1.3_0: bows with your head to your feet,
ai-tha-ap289:2.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap289:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap289:2.4_0: this fruit is the fruit of deed.
ai-tha-ap289:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Gagga.
ai-tha-ap289:5.1_0: Were you not free of greed, hate, and delusion,
